item.title: Trump suggests Starmer could use military to control UK borders
item.description: The US president says illegal migration "destroys countries from within", as his two-day state visit to the UK comes to a close.

item.title: Trump says TV networks 'against' him should 'maybe' lose licence, after Kimmel suspension
item.description: "Maybe their licence should be taken away," Trump said of broadcasters that he argued covered him unfairly.

item.title: Sarah Smith: Trump visit showed UK's warm relations - and limited influence
item.description: The good-natured state visit demonstrated strong relations, but no ally is likely to change the US president's mind.

item.title: At least 10 dead in Lagos high-rise office building fire
item.description: Some commercial workers in Afriland Towers jumped out of the third and fourth floors when the fire started.

item.title: US deportees sue Ghana over 'illegal' detention
item.description: Despite opposition to the deal, Ghana's president says 40 more deportees will arrive from the US.
